console.helpGlobal:
Here is a list of the available commands :

-'help' = shows this menu

-'exit' = exit the command prompt

-'launchindividual' nomSauvegarde = launches a save indivudally

-'launchgrouped' nomSauvegarde1;nomSauvegarde2 = launches grouped saves in order to multithreading add the option ':multithreading' 


(press any key to continue)
